Example of YAML

---
title: "Diagnostics of Edison's Data"
author: "OPM"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`"
output:
  bookdown::gitbook:
   split_by: none
   self_contained: true
   css: "style.css"
   toc_depth: 5
  bookdown::word_document2: 
    tables:
      style: Table
      layout: autofit
      width: 1.0   
  
  
   
---



\@ref(type:ref)

type can be fig, tab, eq
ref is the label

avoid using under scores in chunk labels (it will stop rendering the figure number _
